name: Monster Mash (itch) (HalfwayWrong Games)
description:
Dracula's cemetery has been over-run with zombies, and worse - mutant killer Garlic! Destroy the zombies and garlic to restore peace to the cemetery.

Move - WASD or arrow keys
Shoot - Space bar

Made as a combined entry for the OpenGameArt Summer Jam 2021 and A Game By It's Cover 2021.

I used this famicase by mellodillo as inspiration.

For full credits, see below, or in-game.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
